translations: n.访谈；面试；面谈（interview 的复数）
v.面试（interview 的三单形式）；接见

phrs.translation: 个人面谈；面谈调查；私人的会谈
对顾客需要的深入查询
结构化面试；结构式访谈
n. （对考生进行的）口头审查；非结构化面试；非结构性面谈

sentences.sentence: She comes across well in interviews.
sentences.translation: 她在面试中常给人留下很好的印象。

sentences.sentence: She insisted on being present at all the interviews.
sentences.translation: 她坚决要求出席所有的采访。

sentences.sentence: Quite a considerable number of interviews are going on.
sentences.translation: 许许多多的面试正在进行。
